amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-259 to expand the permissible uses of MRA funds that have been designated for Member security to include residential security systems that do not constitute structural improvements to Members' homes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Love amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Love amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Love.
